articles.title: Oil surges above $100 for first time since 2014 as Russia attacks Ukraine - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices surged, with Brent breaching $100 a barrel for the first time since 2014 on Thursday as Russia attacked Ukraine, exacerbating concerns that a war in Europe could disrupt global energy supplies.
articles.content: BEIJING, Feb 24 (Reuters) - Oil prices surged, with Brent breaching $100 a barrel for the first time since 2014 on Thursday as Russia attacked Ukraine, exacerbating concerns that a war in Europe coul… [+4102 chars]

articles.title: EU removes Grace Mugabe, Zimbabwe's vice-president and army commander from sanctions list - News24
articles.description: The European Union has removed already suspended targeted sanctions on the last three Zimbabwean public officials and politicians on the list.
articles.content:
• Grace Mugabe, Zimbabwe's second in command and an army boss have been removed from the European Union's sanctions list.
